mapper.select: SELECT EP_CODE, EP_OFCODE, EP_DPCODE, EP_NAME, OF_NAME, DP_NAME FROM EP INNER JOIN "OF" ON EP_OFCODE = OF_CODE INNER JOIN DP ON EP_DPCODE = DP_CODE WHERE EP_CODE= #{epcode}
